overview: French superstud/director Manuel Ferrara is a major fan of girls with thick, juicy booties. Phat Bottom Girls 6 is his latest entry in the series that won Best Gonzo Series at the 2012 Xbiz Awards and AVNs 2012 Best Big Butt Series honor. Manuel has cast four of the finest, plumpest asses for this edition.
title: Phat Bottom Girls 6
